textAfterTable: Listener comments!   Mon. 10/26/09 6:02pm Charles-A.: Welcome to The Media Squat   Mon. 10/26/09 6:03pm Charles-A.: We're open to suggestions.   Mon. 10/26/09 6:05pm Charles-A.: Energy, the ability to do work, is one thing. Anergy, the ability to slack off, is quite another thing.   Mon. 10/26/09 6:09pm Charles-A.: At that point, free energy would destroy the current providers unless and unil they figured ouot a way to profit from it.   Mon. 10/26/09 6:10pm Charles-A.: Kewl. Fun with scanners. That takes me back.
